bibl.title: New Light on the katagraphé and its Pharaonic Background.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: A more detailed version, "Aux origines de la katagraphé", is forthcoming in: Bernard LEGRAS (Éd.), Actes du colloque international 'Transferts culturels et droits dans le monde grec et hellénistique'. Reims, 14-17 mai 2008.

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007

bibl.seg: ALLAM Schafik, New Light on the katagraphé and its Pharaonic Background.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 13-19.

A more detailed version, "Aux origines de la katagraphé", is forthcoming in: Bernard LEGRAS (Éd.), Actes du colloque international 'Transferts culturels et droits dans le monde grec et hellénistique'. Reims, 14-17 mai 2008.
